name: Beast of the Sky
HP: 4 + four times your ranger level (the beast has a number of Hit Dice [d6s] equal to your ranger level)

traits.Flyby: The beast doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.
traits.Primal Bond: You can add your proficiency bonus to any ability check or saving throw that the beast makes.

actions.Shred: Melee Weapon Attack: your spell attack modifier to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 3 + PB slashing damage
